Date: Friday, 1/31/1984
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Jose Ramirez



Date: Tuesday, 2/4/1984

I'm looking forward to playing with West Texas!

Regards,
Jose Ramirez

any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Scotty Knight
Dear Sir,
Scotty Knight has nothing more to prove at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .439 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.
